sentences.en: I can't overemphasize the cleanliness of this place.
sentences.cn: 这里的清洁卫生我怎么强调也不为过。

sentences.en: Many of the state's beaches fail to meet minimum standards of cleanliness.
sentences.cn: 该州的许多海滩没能达到最低清洁标准。

sentences.en: A number of Britain's beaches fail to meet European standards on cleanliness.
sentences.cn: 英国有几处海滩不符合欧洲的清洁标准。
